channel.description: Recent content in C# on KrolTech

item.title: Angular.js, new “Secret” website, Pluralsight
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: Learned about $http with Angular when calling external resources (like JSON) – need to test on TI.com implementation. Continued developing business plan for “Secret” website (created survey questions, etc.). Researched payment processing for site and discovered Amazon Payments offers better rates than Paypal once you get into the higher sales volume (greater than 10k). Completed Pluralsight course on N-Tier Development in C#.
